## Import Data
- The data is stored in `./data` directory (not part of github)
```{r import_data}
library(readxl)
lab_data <- read_excel("../data/2019_ITSIH_9.xlsx", 
   col_types = c("text", "text", "text", 
       "numeric", "date", "numeric", "numeric", 
       "text", "text", "text"))
```

```{r general description of the data}
library(Hmisc)
describe(lab_data)
```
